column4: Known issue that switching users while compiz is loaded causes the screen to turn white?
there are several issues with session management in compiz, apparently the developers need stuff that's only implemented in the upcoming xorg releases for user switching to work correctly
Ah, thanks. Hadn't heard about that. But guess that's what I get for not staying up to date with the stuff.
the latest http://planet.compiz-fusion.org/ blog entry says that "session management" is one of the 'everlasting issues' they are working on
